title: Pes ec or rr
content:
Does both the colleges have same syllabus 
I heard that pes rr is autonomous whereas ec campus is under vtu? Is it true

comments.body: Please check the faqs before asking the questions. And no it's not under vtu

Yes they have the same syllabus and exams happen at same time.
who gave you that misinformation? doxx them PESU will send bouncers to defeat em
My classmates said this to me nvm my bad
It was under vtu till 2017 now it's the same
